ability.Frenzy Overload: Immune to Dragon-type and Fairy-type attacks.
ability.Virus Mastery: Dragon-type moves have their secondary effect chance increased to 100%.

Frenzy Beam.effect: Has a 20% chance to inflict Frenzy condition to the target, for 3 turns, reducing the target's Defense by 1 stage each end of the turn.

Virus Eruption.effect: Have a 20% chance to toxic the target.

Shadow Pummel.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.
